nodes.text: R82 Jump Boots were a type of boot produced by the Aratech Repulsor Company and sold for 2,000 credits. The boots made use of repulsorlift generators and rocket units in order to boost the wearer's jumps and allow them to temporarily glide in the air at altitudes of up to 35 meters.
R82 Jump Boots were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
